hero_title:
# Github-free accounts for *Decap CMS*

You use [Decap CMS](https://decapcms.org/), but not on Netlify? You also don't want to ask your users to create a Github account to login? And you also don't want to setup your own authentication and user management service? This is just what you need.

meta.description: Welcome page for your new website.
